entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 4:16PM EDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Pulaski, southwestern Giles, northeastern Bland and southeastern Mercer Counties through 445 PM EDT...
